website_summaries.verdict: Whether you want to take your time exploring the shoreline or speed it up a bit, this beach cruiser offers the craftsmanship and features that are sure to give you a superior ride.
pros: A beautiful bike with classic curved cruiser lines with a sturdy frame
Garners enthusiasm for its smooth, comfortable ride
comes with a handy carrying rack
cons: Consumers occasionally receive packages with missing pieces, and customer service could be more helpful when issues arise

customer_reviews.title: Much smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: This bike is not what they claim. I'm 5' 10" and this bike is too small for me. I look like I'm riding a little kids bike. My wife and kids actually laughed at me when they saw me ride it. Unfortunately it arrived the day we left for a long vacation and when we got home and i got the bike together and I realized that it was way too small for me, it was past the return date with Amazon. So now I'm stuck with a $200+ bike that looks nice collecting dust in the garage
customer_reviews.author: christopher m.

customer_reviews.title: Can't assemble, no customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I unpacked the bike and immediately ran into an issue. When I tried to install the front wheel it doesn't fit. The front fork is too narrow and doesn't. The instructions are no help because they are generic for all their bikes and not specific to this bike. I reached out to their customer service by both phone and email but haven't heard back. Right now I just have a pile of bike parts on my floor and it's looking more and more like I'm going to have to go through the hassle of sending it all back.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike... Couple of things to look out for.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this bike for about 2 months now and I am loving it. Couple of recommendations: get your own allen wrenches and regular wrench kit. The wrenches included are too small and also have a screwdriver attched which stabs you in the hand when you try to fasten. Also be sure to fasten the screws underneath the seat, both my bike and my wife’s were loose and the seat bounced around for a while. Once assembled these bikes rode great. Sleek look, good sturdy material, nice paint finish. Overall thrilled with the quality of the bike.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cruising comfortably!
customer_reviews.text: Our bikes arrived well boxed with everything needed for assembly. We bought the 7 speed, which requires making some adjustments which were well explained in the instructions. We have been on several rides since and have found the bikes to be comfortable and easy to ride. We have especially found the racks on the back more useful than we expected. sixthreezero has been especially good at following up to ensure our satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis N

customer_reviews.title: Looks good feels good but failed to deliver the entire product.
customer_reviews.text: The product looked like it was already partially opened when I received it. It appears that some of the product got lost when it got shipped and Amazon can't do a single thing about getting me a replacement for the broken/missing items. It was missing the front and rear reflector, and the plastic cap was broken upon arrival. The bike was easy to assemble however and the seat is comfortable to sit on. I wish I read the manual before I started to assemble the bike that way I would have known that it was missing parts.
customer_reviews.author: Stealth tree 9000

customer_reviews.title: Just assembled impression of Around-the-block 26" mens
customer_reviews.text: I really like it. It does have some areas where cost-saving is evident. The chain guard, you've got to bend to adjust; allowing free-spinning of chain without clicking sounds. You've also got to adjust the brakes, and tune it up properly in order to achieve a squeakless-clean assembly. However, I'm certain you could say that of any bicycle that comes in a box, and not from an around-the-corner shop. The assembly instructions could be more clear, they send a version that includes several bike styles; but I managed to get it done. I do have one scuff on the handlebars that neither came from delivery or assembly - must be factory. But personally, I can live with that.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome 7 speed cruiser
customer_reviews.text: Very cool bike, I got the 7 speed, came in double boxes, we well wrapped with all components. For the price you cant beat it. took me about an hour to assemble and looks great. I will have to tune it a bit but that will just take me a few minutes. Very happy with the overall service, and the information they provided about questions, concerns, etc. I will most likely buy another for my girlfriend here in a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: instructions need to improve
customer_reviews.text: once you finally get assembled, good bike, here my pros and cons: Pros: Nice design Comfortable seat. Cons: Instructions lacks of details and correct zoom in pictures. Shimano gear supposed to be 7 speeds, although impossible set more than 6 Brakes sounds. Regards CR
customer_reviews.author: Cr

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike! Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This is such a fun bike! I am having a great time with my kids and comfortable at the same time. The front wheel needed some adjusting in order to spin straight and not run on the brakes but my husband figured it out. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Good deal, solid bike.
customer_reviews.text: Looks and works as described. The gears are Shimano Tourney which was better than expected. Packaging was solid. Saddle is OK but not unbelievably comfortable. Overall it's a good deal and quality is on par with price.
customer_reviews.author: filthy

customer_reviews.title: The new bike came and was easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: The bike came without pedals and the hardware needed to complete the build. It seemed that a small box was inadvertently left out of the packaging during shipping. I contacted the company and they sent me a new bike quickly (I returned the other bike). The new bike came and was easy to put together. We had some issue with the front brake....it broke during assembly...but I took it to my friends bike shop and he was able to fix the brakes. I love the look of the bike and my son loves the ride. Despite a few hiccups....it was a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: KWag

customer_reviews.title: This bike will make you cool.
customer_reviews.text: Once adjusted it is very comfortable. Looks very cool. Assembly is relatively easy, I have some experience so it was pretty easy. The instructions are fine. Be ready to do some riding, adjusting, riding, adjusting, riding, adjusting, riding...etc.
customer_reviews.author: J. Garvey

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike!
customer_reviews.text: Love the Bike. I'm not a handy person so i had the bike assemble professional. Also because i added custom mag wheels as shown in the picture. The one disappointment was the handlebars are a shinny black when the rest of the frame is matte black color which i preferred. Lastly the only other sour note is front reflector i received is not what is shown in the picture. I checked sixthreezero website to look for replacement reflectors with no luck. Other than that the picture shows how nice this bike really looks.
customer_reviews.author: elsa castro

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable ride
customer_reviews.text: I traded this in from a 18 inch bike and I can say it's very comfortable. It squeaked and made a loud grinding noise when applying the brakes. I adjusted the brakes and that helped. I like this bike and enjoy riding it as a big guy the tires don't seem to squash.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Great bike. I love the style and the gears ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bike. I love the style and the gears work great. 7-speed on a cruiser style bike is great, giving you a high ride while still allowing you to tackle hills with ease. I live in a very hilly neighborhood, and I've enjoyed the several times that I've taken this out for a ride so far (only had it a few weeks). The only con is that this bike is a little heavy, but for the price, I am extremely satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Thompson

customer_reviews.title: One happy buyer! I bought the men's 26-inch 7-speed Around ...
customer_reviews.text: One happy buyer! I bought the men's 26-inch 7-speed Around the Block, with black matte finish. It arrived on time, expertly packaged, and completely free of any dings, dents, or scratches. I assembled it with no trouble in a couple of hours, but at my age (senior), that's pretty good. Basic mechanical knowledge was enough, and the instructions were clear. The bike is beautiful, comfortable, suitable for young and old, and a joy to ride. I'm usually not a review writer, but I felt this company and its product deserve some praise.
customer_reviews.author: W. T.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Front wheel of bike was bent when I finally went to assemble the bicycle. Due to Covid I have been very busy the whole bike has bent pieves to it
customer_reviews.author: Buys too much and I hold sellers to what they advertise.

customer_reviews.title: Great way to see Galveston Island!
customer_reviews.text: This a great bike for tooling around Galveston Island. I have thoroughly riding a bike again. Very comfortable and relaxing to ride.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Neil

customer_reviews.title: Great bike
customer_reviews.text: I researched and decided to purchase the sixthreezero bike. It was easy to assemble and the ride is great. I am 6'1" and 180lbs. It's a cool retro looking bike.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Holland

customer_reviews.title: Great bike!
customer_reviews.text: Great bike and relatively easy to assemble. My husband loves it. He has back problems so being able to sit up straight while riding is great - and it's not too flashy like many men's cruiser bikes. Rides very well and sits comfortably. The 7 speeds make the hills a lot easier. Great bike.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Quick to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The bike arrived on time and was relatively easy to assemble. The multi-wrench and allen wrenches that were included were very helpful. The only two challenges were: 1) I had to remove one front brake pad in order to get the front wheel in place. 2) The handle bar kept tilting up or down, I really had to crank hard on the bolt to get it tight enough. One last thing... for future purchasers, please make the font bigger in the assembly manual :)
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Just finished putting together my new sixthreezero Around the Block 7-speed. If you follow the instructions is it will go smoothly. Note: If at first you don't see the hex head to adjust your handlebars, it may be hiding under a black plastic plug. Pop that out and there is the hex head slot. If you handlebars won't go into the fork throat, just loosen that long hex screw with your allen wrench and it will go right in. Can't wait to taking my new bike camping next week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything that I expected! - Very comfortable ride.
customer_reviews.text: Putting the bike together was simple enough; took about 30 minutes. The only problem was calibrating brakes and gears. It took a few tries to get these to work. The ride is perfect. I am 6'3" and I can sit perfectly upright on the bike and ride. I have the seven speed and I can navigate really well up hills and steering is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Functional  - Fine 4 Pedestrian Usage but not Much More
customer_reviews.text: OK bike to get around in although it looks a little quirky and at times the seats a little jerky but you can take it to worky.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brown

customer_reviews.title: This is a piece of junk, stay away.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible bicycle, broke after 6 weeks. Pedals keep on making wierd noises.
customer_reviews.author: Hijakilan

customer_reviews.title: Bike destroyed itself
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this bike for my son and he was able to ride the bike only a few times before the shifter completely broke. Super disappointed, as the bike was very nice until that happened and easy to assemble. Waiting to see what the company does to make this right.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly G

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY! Both wheels warped
customer_reviews.text: Both wheels warped on arrival. Putting it together was also a hassle. STAY AWAY FROM THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I had never bought a bike that wasn’t fully assembled...but I was able to follow the instructions and build this one! I am very happy with the quality and look of the bike. The instructions were easy to follow and I am thrilled with how it turned out. Very stylish, high quality and durable. Love the bike.
customer_reviews.author: Polly

customer_reviews.title: Oooooowwwwweeeeeeee!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Oooooowwwwweeeee!!! Got my Around the Block today and I love it. Easy to put together, looks good and rides so smooth. I am a big man and it fits me this is a serious Cruiser bike.
customer_reviews.author: Dnewton0069

customer_reviews.title: Ok bike
customer_reviews.text: The bike is okay. It doesn't shift gears very easily. I bought the seven gear bike, but effectively it only seems to have 6 gears. There is one gear it doesn't seem to ever want to go into.
customer_reviews.author: SugarJ85

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, Great Bike!!
customer_reviews.text: My 14 year old son totally loves his new, sleek, flat black 7-speed bike. He rode it all weekend with a huge smile on his face - even in the rain! We love it too. A great bike, at a great price, with top quality construction and components, delivered to our door. What's not to love? Would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: R. Cayetano

customer_reviews.title: lack luster
customer_reviews.text: Overall after weeks with the bike I'm honestly not Happy with it. shifter, bike pedals, bike seat are all very noisy, comfort is okay, but I expected more. I think next time I will purchase a bike from a store instead.
customer_reviews.author: brandon

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and pretty easy to put together. There are also a few YouTube assembly videos that are helpful too. Definitely a great activity while this pandemic is going on. For the price and comfort I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: David Fraser

customer_reviews.title: Very good, shy of great.
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was punctured by bike axles, which wouldn't matter much if the wheels turn out to be perfectly true. But I had to do a little spoke tuning to get them true enough for a tighter break pad clearance. Bike is comfortable and suits me well. So I am pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the bike
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the bike! Perfect for cruising! My wife and I are nearing retirement and are looking forward to lots of fun riding our bikes! She has ordered a sixthreezero, also! Thank you so much!!
customer_reviews.author: TIM D.

customer_reviews.title: Easy, thoughtful, & comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Putting this bike together was super easy; the instruction booklet + online tutorials walk you through it step by step. It's a very comfortable ride, a well-made bike. For neighborhood riding, an excellent choice!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Fried

customer_reviews.title: great for upright back posture but huge bike
customer_reviews.text: Perfection in color, style, comfort, great for upright back posture but huge bike. Love it with twinkle lights
customer_reviews.author: BlueSea Iris

customer_reviews.title: Great, strong bike.
customer_reviews.text: The bike itself is amazing, some of the parts were machine tightened and presented some difficulty adjusting, also the front tire proved to be a challenge installing with the brake system attached, but was easy enough to figure out.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great bicycle!
customer_reviews.text: The product description says that this bike is for the "uncomplicated man" and that's me! The bike shipped and arrived quickly, was easy to assemble and looks great. I like the wide, comfortable seat and I'm looking forward to riding around our neighborhood on it with my wife.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: BEST BIKE I EVER HAD !!!  ( besides my Harley )
customer_reviews.text: I bought my sixthreezero bike before the COVID PANDEMIC hit the USA, My wife liked my bike so much she bought one for herself ! When my bike arrived it was well packed and easily assembled. The bike is well built,I weigh over 200lbs and have never had any issues with it.I highly recommend sixthreezero bikes !!!
customer_reviews.author: paul weiser

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic looking cruiser
customer_reviews.text: This bike looks great, has a nice solid frame and a smooth ride. I am 6'4" and 205 lbs and this bike fits me with the handle bars fully extended and the seat low. I gave a 4 star rating instead of a 5 because with the handle bars fully extended I would have liked them to feel a slight bit more sturdy. Although I don't believe they will ever be a problem, it is the one thing keeping this 7 speed cruiser from being perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Super sweet bike.
customer_reviews.text: This bike is great! This was my 2nd bike I’ve put together and it was super easy. It took maybe an hour. It looks awesome and is a great ride. I love it. The matte black is super cool. It does take some adjusting to get right but that should be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Toffolo

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy delivery.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the design, the flat style paint instead of the glossy look and the fact that the tires were already inflated. I didn’t like how some of the screws screw in backwards. I had a REALLY difficult time with the front brakes. I really like the fact that I can get a bell for my new bicycle.
customer_reviews.author: Terrence Velasquez

customer_reviews.title: Great looking bike
customer_reviews.text: This thing rocks, my only complaint would be the tools and a few elevated paint spots
customer_reviews.author: Jose E.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, being happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with the bike, i have it up for sale on offer up. The pedals and poorly designed. My feet slip off the pedals. I have never had this problem before. The back of my leg is banged up. The bike is heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Love this bike
customer_reviews.text: We bought 4 Six Three Zero bikes during the COVID shutdown. They are great bikes at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Kim G.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bike
customer_reviews.text: Super nice bike with great quality. Shipping was fast too. The bike comes mostly assemble and it was easy to setup the remaining. Overall my experience with this bike is 10 stars !!!
customer_reviews.author: Albert Rideaux IV

customer_reviews.title: higher quality, lower cost
customer_reviews.text: higher quality and lower cost than most budget bikes out there. Shifts smooth, rides great. Probably buying another one for my brother.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter W. Kern

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Bike
customer_reviews.text: The asthetics are on this bike are on another level. After tuning the bike it rides like it should and I haven't had any problems with it since. Comfortable to ride and easy going. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Armando

customer_reviews.title: Cool bike!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good bike, the quality of the materials is ok and it is quite comfortable to ride. Also, the design is really cool! However, the gears are not working perfectly (I bought the 7 gears version). All in all it's worth the price and I would definitely recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Andrea B.

customer_reviews.title: Great bike. Very few issues.
customer_reviews.text: I love the finish the on the bike. The matte finish is very nice. Only issues I had with the bike was installing the front wheel, the brake pads do prevent fully entry of the wheel. And the rear break does make noise when braking at a decent speed. Other than that, the bike is great.
customer_reviews.author: the_wild_thing 14

customer_reviews.title: Very reasonable price for a great bike.
customer_reviews.text: I just got this bike and it is so comfortable to ride. I put the bike together in about an hour and it was very easy to do. I definitely recommend this bike to anyone looking for a relaxing ride.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Rides Great
customer_reviews.text: Got my bike put together out here in Hawaii and love taking it down to the beach. Takes some time to get put together but the instructions are straight forward. Can’t wait to get some more rides in on it.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Bye

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike
customer_reviews.text: GREAT BIKE I BOUGHT THREE SPEED AND IT RIDES AND PEDDLES GREAT
customer_reviews.author: Olleneg

customer_reviews.title: ... this men's retro bike for my husband since he liked my Sixthreezero 3 speed ladies in Scholar Cream
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this men's retro bike for my husband since he liked my Sixthreezero 3 speed ladies in Scholar Cream. He found his matte black men's bike assembly a bit of a challenge due to missing items or incorrectly spaced holes but really likes the bike in the end. We would recommend our Sixthreezero bikes to a friend,
customer_reviews.author: Debra M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly! Looks great! My husband loves the matter finish. Cool bike.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Arriving in one piece!
customer_reviews.text: The bike arrived complete, a little scratch, but no worries. The seat is not the best, so you may want to invest in a better seat... kind of plastic and squeaky. Looking for a better seat. Overall, the delivery was great with Prime! The man's bike frame at 26 inches is good for a small adult.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Riemersma

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bike
customer_reviews.text: Bike was delivered promptly and arrived on schedule. Assembly directions were accurate and easy to follow. Very satisfied with everything about the bike and it is a very comfortable and fun ride! Thank you....I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Robert B. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bike!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for hubby’s Christmas gift. The bike is good quality and really nice looking. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Creativemode

customer_reviews.title: Great bike well made!
customer_reviews.text: I love the geometry and styling of this bike. Heavy duty frame supports my 275 lbs well. you can take this one to the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Clark

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assembly, looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Just assembled my bike and it was pretty easy. I was worried that I could potentially get a damaged bike as some other reviewers but everything arrive almost perfect. There was a small scratch on the handle bars. Other than that everything was great and I love the style and color of the bike. Can’t wait to take it for a ride!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bike, easy assembly and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my bike. Such a cool look, rides great and it took about 45 minutes to put together. I would get some oil or WD40 for the chain but other than that no tools really needed.
customer_reviews.author: lions19

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike
customer_reviews.text: Because my shoulders can't handle a 21 speed road bike anymore, I bought this one. It's perfect. Comfortable and easy to ride. I take longer rides now than I used to because it's so much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Alyn K

customer_reviews.title: Front tire assembly
customer_reviews.text: Under 1 hr assembly. Deflate front tire before installation so that you don't have to mess with the front brakes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this cruising bike!
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was very straightforward with clear and articulate assembly instructions. Bought this bike for my husband, and a 24" Around the Block for myself. Smooth ride and comfortable seat! We have enjoyed everything about these bikes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love riding this bike
customer_reviews.text: Came late and a little dinged up but it was worth the wait! I love riding this bike!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bike!  Sometimes difficult to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: Great bike and stylish for town riding. Sometimes hard to maneuver in small places because the bike is so big.
customer_reviews.author: Eric P. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looking bike and very easy to put together! Also rides great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Bike
customer_reviews.text: Had a little trouble putting together, but otherwise a good cruiser.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Devine

customer_reviews.title: Great bike
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new bike and this worked out for me. I like the price and the bike looks great.

customer_reviews.title: Fun cruiser to ride in Florabama.
customer_reviews.text: Great bike to ride and comfortable. Very good instructions for assembly, I assembled the bike in 20 from the time the box was opened and went for a ride.
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie

customer_reviews.title: Good bike.
customer_reviews.text: It took 30 minutes to assemble. Other things were easy, but it was difficult to adjust the brakes. So I helped by the bike shop. I think it is a good bicycle at reasonable prices.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle

customer_reviews.title: This is the best bike! My wife and I both got one ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the best bike! My wife and I both got one and we both love them.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: My husband loved the bike
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved the bike. It took not long to put it together and it has been fun to use by our new home. The gears can be adjusted for different speeds. We will recommend these 2 bikes to our friends
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bike for my husband to match a version that I purchased last month for myself. My husband really likes it, it's comfortable, handsome, and solid.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Howson

customer_reviews.title: Great bike at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for taking rides with my daughter and having the gears makes it much easier going up and down mild Hills.
customer_reviews.author: C-Money

customer_reviews.title: Good bike
customer_reviews.text: My son is enjoying this bike so far without any issue
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: We have had the bike only a week but totally love it! Easy to put together. Super fun to ride. The seat is really comfortable too.
customer_reviews.author: Ohshin Savage

customer_reviews.title: Sad boy hours
customer_reviews.text: Box was received damaged and the bike tire sole had a hole in it
customer_reviews.author: Carson McCombs

customer_reviews.title: But pretty bike.
customer_reviews.text: Brand new, scratch on top bar, tire wont hold air. But pretty bike.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Wason

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good looking bike! So easy to assemble. Took under 30 minutes. Really enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Ebel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful in Black!
customer_reviews.text: Received my bike today and I love it! It took me about 45 min to assemble it but when I was done it looks fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Great value!!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and smooth ride (streets and bike paths). Took me about 75 mins. to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recomended.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice bike for the money. Easy to assemble. I ride almost every day.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Eichbauer

customer_reviews.title: So far I love it. It's quite affordable and in good quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm riding it every day for my commute. So far I love it. It's quite affordable and in good quality!!!
customer_reviews.author: SEONGUNG CHOI

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Verry nice bike,easy to assemble. I had it assembled in under 30 minuets and instructions were easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: sixthreezero Around The Block Men's 7-Speed Beach Cruiser Bicycle, 26" Wheels, Matte Black with Black Seat and Grips
product_meta.description: Cruise with style on the supremely comfortable Around The Block men's bike, featuring an upright riding design and sweeping cruiser handlebars to keep your back and shoulders relaxed. The comfort and ease of the sixthreezero Around The Block make it great for casual jaunts — whether to the beach, down the bike path, or around the neighborhood. The Around the Block amps up its eye-catchingly curvy steel cruiser frame with comfort details like high-density foam grips on the wide handlebars, a dual-spring seat that ensures tailbone comfort on long rides, and 2. 125-inch wide aluminum wheels with large waffle tread tires (available in 24-inch and 26-inch sizes) that help smooth out the bumps. The Around The Block men's bike is available in four gearing options: 21-speed Shimano Tourney derailleur and EZ Fire Plus shifter help you tackle demanding street, trail, long distance, and uphill riding. Front and rear handbrakes make stopping easy and precise. 7-speed Shimano external hub allows for a wide range of riding — from leisure to long distance commutes. Includes front and rear handbrakes. 3-speed Shimano internal hub with easy-to-use Nexus shifter enables you to handle longer distances and moderate hills. Includes front handbrake and rear coaster brake. Single-speed model offers ultimate simplicity, and is ideal for flat terrain. The coaster braking system is simple — just pedal backwards to glide to a stop. This bike comes with a chain guard to protect pant cuffs from getting caught, plus a rear rack for use with optional panniers, baskets, and other accessories. The 26-inch Around The Block (19-inch frame) is sized for riders from 5 feet to 6 feet, 4 inches tall, and the 24-inch model (15-inch frame) is sized for riders from 4 feet, 3 inches to 4 feet, 11 inches tall. It comes 85% assembled. Designed with comfort, ease, and eye-catching style, sixthreezero bikes offer affordable quality for a vast range of riders.
feature_bullets: Men's 7-speed cruiser bike with classic style and exceptional performance for leisure, commuting, and exercise
7-speed Shimano external hub for a wide range of riding; front and rear handbrakes for smooth stops
26-inch wheels with large waffle-tread tires for a cushioned ride; seat and handlebar geometry puts you in a comfortable upright, heads-up position
Cushioned dual-spring bike seat and high-density foam handgrips for comfort
Fits riders from 5 feet to 6 feet 4 inches tall; comes 85 percent assembled
